dcterms:creator: A. Shahroudy
J. Liu
T.-T. Ng
G. Wang
dcterms:description: A large scale dataset for 3D skeleton based action recognition, recorded by Kinect V2 sensors, containing 56,880 3D skeleton sequences from 40 different performers covering 60 daily actions.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 60

dcterms:creator: J. Liu
A. Shahroudy
M. Perez
G. Wang
L.-Y. Duan
A. C. Kot
dcterms:description: An extension of the NTU RGB+D 60 dataset, containing 113,945 skeleton sequences covering 120 daily action classes, recorded by a larger number of performers and camera views.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 120

dcterms:creator: J. Liu
A. Shahroudy
M. Perez
G. Wang
L.-Y. Duan
A. C. Kot
dcterms:description: A subset of the NTU RGB+D 120 dataset, containing 57,367 3D skeleton sequences covering the last 60 action classes in NTU RGB+D 120, with no intersection with the NTU RGB+D 60 dataset.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 61-120
